FROM code AS c WHERE 1=1 AND delNy = 0 AND cdName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shKeyCd},'%')
mapper.select: SELECT cdSeq , cdName , (select cgSeq FROM codeGroup AS g WHERE g.cgSeq = c.codeGroup_cgSeq) AS cgNameOne , delNy FROM code as c WHERE cdSeq = #{cdSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE code SET delNy = 1 WHERE cdSeq = #{cdSeq}
